description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Swirl Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spiced Swirl Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease a 3.5L (14 cup) capacity pan with butter and add 1 tbs of flour. Coat pan well. Tip out excess flour.
Combine pumpkin, honey and spices in a bowl. Cool then stir in yoghurt.
In a separate bowl, beat remaining butter and sugar together for 5 minutes until pale and creamy.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in the remaining flour, in alternate batches with pumpkin mixture, until smooth. Transfer to pan.
Bake for 1 hour or until cooked when tested. Cool in pan for 20 minutes before turning out onto a wire rack to cool completely.

Place cake onto a cake stand. Mix icing sugar with enough milk until it forms a smooth icing. Stir in vanilla. Drizzle icing over cake with nuts and fruit. Serve. Note: With your wooden spoon, stir the butter and sugar until they are light and fluffy. The butter is "creamed" when it has almost doubled in mass and it has lightened to a yellowish-white colour.
